# StateBookmark

**Structure**

A snapshot of the game state at a point in time.

## Declaration

```swift
struct StateBookmark
```

## Overview

Add bookmarks between turns so that you can jump to a prior turn and continue gameplay from there. When you jump to a bookmark, you reset the game state back to that point in time.

To add a bookmark, use the [doc://com.apple.tabletopkit/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopAction/createBookmark(_:context:)] or similar method. To jump to a bookmark, use the [doc://com.apple.tabletopkit/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopGame/jumpToBookmark(_:)] or similar method.

## Initializing bookmarks

- **init(id:)**

## Bookmarks

- **StateBookmarkIdentifier**: A unique identifier for bookmarks.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: StateBookmark
